name: Galactic Goalie
description:
This is my first release, so please be gentle.  

Defend your galactic goal in this difficult but fun arcade game.

This project was created for KenneyJam2017.  Hope you enjoy!  

PS.  Comment with your high score!  I will donate any money raised to Gamer's Outreach Charity.

Notes & Thank Yous:

Graphical Assets by kenney (kenney.nl)

Music by neocrey (available on Unity asset store)

Thank you to my wonderful wife for supporting my hobby.

Thank you to Kenney and Crew for hosting the #kenneyjam and for the wonderful assets.

Thank you to all the other participants for your welcoming attitudes and helpful suggestions.
